getStatsOfProgress.SERVICE_NAME:
SELECT AVG(ROUND(S.CV*100/S.SV,2)) AS EVA_A
FROM (
SELECT A.SP_NAME, C.CREATEDT, C.STATUS, A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, C.PROGRESS, C.SBL_ROLE,C.BL_KEY
, (SELECT BL_TEXT FROM BACK_LOG WHERE BL_KEY = C.BL_KEY) AS BL_TEXT
, ROUND(IF(STR_TO_DATE(A.START_DATE,'%Y%m%d') > NOW()
,0, IF(STR_TO_DATE(A.END_DATE,'%Y%m%d') < NOW()
,100,((DATEDIFF(STR_TO_DATE(A.END_DATE,'%Y%m%d'),NOW()))*100/
(DATEDIFF(STR_TO_DATE(A.END_DATE,'%Y%m%d'),STR_TO_DATE(A.START_DATE,'%Y%m%d')))
))),2) AS SV , IFNULL(C.PROGRESS,0) AS CV , C.SBL_KEY
FROM SPRINT A LEFT OUTER JOIN SPRINT_BACK_LOG C ON A.SP_KEY = C.SP_KEY
WHERE A.PMCode = ?
) S

getProgress.SERVICE_NAME:
SELECT S.* , ROUND(S.CV*100/S.SV,2) AS EVA
FROM (
SELECT A.SP_NAME, C.CREATEDT, C.STATUS, A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, C.PROGRESS, C.SBL_ROLE,C.BL_KEY
, (SELECT BL_TEXT FROM BACK_LOG WHERE BL_KEY = C.BL_KEY) AS BL_TEXT
, ROUND(IF(STR_TO_DATE(A.START_DATE,'%Y%m%d') > NOW()
,0, IF(STR_TO_DATE(A.END_DATE,'%Y%m%d') < NOW()
,100,((DATEDIFF(STR_TO_DATE(A.END_DATE,'%Y%m%d'),NOW()))*100/
(DATEDIFF(STR_TO_DATE(A.END_DATE,'%Y%m%d'),STR_TO_DATE(A.START_DATE,'%Y%m%d')))
))),2) AS SV , C.PROGRESS AS CV , C.SBL_KEY
,DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.START_DATE,'%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m-%d') AS START_DATE_F
,DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.END_DATE,'%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m-%d') AS END_DATE_F

FROM SPRINT A LEFT OUTER JOIN SPRINT_BACK_LOG C ON A.SP_KEY = C.SP_KEY
WHERE A.PMCode = ?
) S
ORDER BY S.START_DATE
